Credits

Images

The image on the main page represents a DEC PDP-7, the class of mini-computer for which Ken Thompson developed the UNIX operating system. The image file is available under Creative Commons Share Alike 1.0 license.

Fonts

The fonts used in this web site are:

  • Days One for logo and company name
  • Roboto for all text
